sentences.sContent: Online bookstores can undercut retailers by up to 30%.
sentences.sCn: 网上书店最多能以低于零售店 30% 的价格销售。

synos.tran: 廉价出售；较便宜的工资工作；从下边削球

remMethod.val: under(在…下) + cut(砍) → 从下部切开 → 削价抢生意

trans.tranCn: 廉价出售；较便宜的工资工作；从下边削球
trans.tranOther: to sell goods or a service at a lower price than another company

trans.tranCn: 底切；牛腰部下侧嫩肉；砍口；切球
